aws_cloudwatch_log_group.description: Provides a CloudWatch Log Group resource.

name.description: The name of the log group. If omitted, Terraform will assign a random, unique name.

name_prefix.description: Creates a unique name beginning with the specified prefix. Conflicts with `name`.

kms_key_id.description: The ARN of the KMS Key to use when encrypting log data. Please note, after the AWS KMS CMK is disassociated from the log group,

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the log group.
